title: Crediton Dairy announces £20m investment programme - FoodManufacture.co.uk
summary: Crediton Dairy has announced a £20 million investment to upgrade its processing capabilities, reduce its carbon footprint, and improve employee facilities. The company, which has seen growth in turnover and profits, also launched a new product, Biocol cholesterol lowering milk. The investment follows a successful fiscal year and a growing network of local milk suppliers. Britvic has also invested £22.5 million in a new bottling line in London.
green_innovation: TRUE, because the project includes investment in carbon reduction initiatives and upgrades to processing capabilities which contribute to minimizing environmental impacts.
business_innovation: TRUE, as Crediton Dairy's investments and the launch of new products like Biocol cholesterol lowering milk represent significant improvements in their product offerings.
green_product: TRUE, because Biocol cholesterol lowering milk is designed to have health benefits while being aligned with environmentally sustainable practices.
green_process: TRUE, as the upgrades to processing capabilities and carbon reduction initiatives imply improvements in production methods that minimize environmental impacts.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 311511 Dairy Cattle and Beef Cattle Ranching and Beef Cattle Feedlots, 311 dairy products manufacturing, 212112 Bottled Water Manufacturing, 311920 Coffee and Tea Manufacturing.
greenwashing: FALSE, because there is no indication of misleading information regarding environmental benefits; the investments are aimed at genuine improvements in sustainability.
